name: Ghostrick Fairyâ€Ž
desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned, unless you control a "Ghostrick" monster. During your Main Phase: You can change this card to face-down Defense Position (only once per turn). When this card is flipped face-up: You can target 1 "Ghostrick" card in your GY; Set it to your field, then you can change face-up monsters your opponent controls to face-down Defense Position, up to the number of Set cards you control. Banish the card that was Set from the GY when it leaves the field.
